MAIN_MESSAGE: There are issues with the power  in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.22pm.Our engineers have arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27pm on Wednesday, 14 October 2020
